body.name: Vera Bradley Women's Hardside Underseat Rolling Suitcase Luggage, Fresh-Cut Floral Green, One Size
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 42 mins
features: CHARGE IT UP -- The exterior of this carryon complaint bag features a USB port so you can charge your devices while on the go (battery pack not included)
PRETTY PROTECTION -- The hard shell on this case offers reliable protection from rough handling & fits perfectly in the overhead bin or under the seat in front of you
ORGANIZATION -- The main compartment features 1 mesh zip pocket, 1 slip charger pocket, and adjustable compression straps - plenty of room to pack for a quick trip or a long getaway
MAKE EVERY DAY EASY -- The front compartment features 1 laptop slip pocket and a mesh zip pocket helping you stay completely organized

STYLISH & SIZED RIGHT -- the Hardside Underseat Rolling Suitcase measures 17 inches high, 13 inches wide, & 9 inches deep – with easy-glide wheels, this suitcase is sure to be your favorite travel companion
body.description: Vera Bradley is your go-to brand for rolling suitcases with spinner wheels and rolling travel luggage. You can purchase just one suitcase or matching suit cases to make your own unique suitcase set. Fits under seat. Front compartment features a laptop slip pocket and a mesh zip pocket. Main compartment features a mesh zipper pocket and a slip tech pocket. Compression straps in main compartment. Interior pocket for charger (not included) with cord connecting to exterior charging port. Zip closures. Capacity 22 L. Spot clean with mild detergent and a soft, damp cloth, rinse thoroughly; lay flat to dry

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #396,467 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #441 in Carry-On Luggage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bag ever!!
reviews.reviewText: I travel with my dog frequently & needed a bag that would allow me to access my things easily. I carry him in a crossbody bag & always struggled to get stuff out of my backpack. I was looking for a small roller bag with a front pocket to easily get things I needed. I had purchased several bags but all were too big or didn’t have that front pocket. This bag is PERFECT! It has everything I need. Small, light & has an easy access front pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing little piece of luggage (and super cute)! I take 2 day/1 night trips for work a few times a month, and this bag is great. Wheels roll smoothly and the outer hardside seems very durable. My 15” Dell laptop fits perfectly and securely in the front laptop sleeve. Charging pocket with cable is a nice bonus. I can’t attest to it’s ability to fit underseat, as I also typically travel with a small backpack as my personal item, but it’s very compact. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Piece - With Name Recognition
reviews.reviewText: Don't get me wrong - it is a very nice piece of luggage and I look forward to taking it on our next flight because the dimensions are ideal for using as a carry-on for our specialty shirts and ears for Disney trips. The quality is fantastic, the look is sleek, stylish, and easy to carry, and the lining is silky yet durable. The handle extends to multiple lengths, which is perfect for anyone, and is very comfortable to carry or wheel behind you. The personalized lock combination is also easy to set. It is an excellent piece of well constructed, durable luggage and will absolutely be well loved and well used. However, if this same piece of luggage had an unknown name on it, it would probably be about $95 less. I am someone who does usually gravitate towards well known brands, so that isn't a complaint - just stating the obvious for the sake of an honest review. I love this bag and if you are looking for a well made carry on with a well known name behind it, this is for you! (The deduction of one star is strictly due to the price.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: From the outside it doesn’t look like your typical Vera Bradley item, but once you open it, the pattern is there :)It’s a good quality small luggage. It may be small, but it can pack a good amount of things in there!It has many compartments including a removable laptop bag. USB cable, lock, and a very high telescopic handle- these are worth mentioning.You can open it from the front as well. The wheels are sturdy.Overall, I am happy with this luggage.Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great hard shell, perfect size for a carry on and I love that the wheels are 360.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Front padded pocket will fit a 15 inch laptop.
reviews.reviewText: I love that this little carry-on bag is actually small enough for under-seat storage. So often these rolling bags aren't small enough to go under the seat in front, so they have to be stored in the overhead bin. This one is very compact and truly is small enough for under-seat storage. So if you're traveling and end up on the plane and there's no overhead space, this will tuck right under the seats. So you should be forced to pay to check the bag. It's about the size of a backpack.It's hard sided, but the sides have the look and texture that make it appear like a sift sided nylon. I like this, because I'm personally don't love the shiny/glossy hard sided bags. This one looks soft sided, but is actually hard sided.There are two main compartments. The front pocket opens in a way that it folds outward. The second is the main and largest compartment that's a large open space for all your items. The smaller pocket has a very well padded slot inside that's a good size for a laptop or tablet. I tested it with my laptops and the largest one I could fit into the front pocket slot was my HP 15 inch laptop. So it will comfortably fit a 15 inch computer.Wheels roll smoothly and the telescoping handle on the back is strong. Very happy with the design and how they were able to make a carry-on style bag in a under-seat storage size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a little small.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1.The most appealing feature is the built-in laptop pocket, which provides excellent protection for your laptop.2.It is compact and conforms to most domestic carry-on size limits, making it an ideal travel companion.Cons:1.It is equipped with only two wheels, whereas I would prefer four multi-directional spinner wheels for enhanced maneuverability.2.The overall workmanship could be improved.3.It is slightly expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and well made; great for short trips
reviews.reviewText: I love this suitcase. It is really well made from the durable outer shell to the gorgeous interior. The suitcase has tsa locks which are ideal for air travel. The overall feel of the bag is lightweight but very sturdy. The wheels roll really smoothly and it is easy to maneuver. I like the front compartment. It's great for electronics or a laptop along with other personals. The suitcase would work great as a carry one, but keep in mind it's size. This is a small suitcase good for up to three days if you're a light and efficient packer. Overall, the design and patterned lining is easy to fall in love with and it's functionality is top notch. Great bag for short trips.
